name: Beastfolk
description: Examples include Faun, Centaurs, Birdfolk, Catkin, Frogfolk, Lizardkin, Lionkin, Wolfkin

name: Celestial
description: Beings with affinity to the heavens, notably including angels.

name: Demon
description: Beings with affinity to the underworld. They are also called devils and fiends.

name: Half-Races
description: This is a group of races with many subraces that often have alternate names and high ability variation.

name: Imp
description: Tend to have evil or chaotic alignment. Affinity with demons and tieflings. Speaks with fae and sprites. Sometimes-friend of goblins or orcs. It is also called a gremlin or hobgoblin.

name: Vampire
description: racelike

name: Werewolf
description: racelike

name: Wraith
description: racelike

name: Zombie
description: racelike

name: Awakening Regions
description: Characters awaken between levels -1 and 7, and no one was aware of levels or higher and lower circles until the great vision.

name: Time and Non-Elemental Magic
description: Concepts like time magic, soul swapping, death, love, blood, illusion, and ritual magic are mentioned, which enable new classes and races in new realms.

name: Character Evolution
description: Details on how players can gain new classes and races, the presence of NPCs, and the idea of distributed worlds are discussed.

name: Conditions and Ailments
description: Acquiring conditions like wraithhood, vampirism, and werewolf is mentioned, with wraithhood being attainable through exposure over time.

name: The Echoing Halls
description: Legend speaks of the Echoing Halls hidden beneath the Evergreen Outskirts, a place where echoes of past battles can grant warriors ancient combat techniques and forgotten knowledge.

name: The Starlit Sky Bridge
description: Travelers whisper about a mystical bridge in the Whispering Woods that appears only on starlit nights, leading to a celestial realm with secrets of the cosmos and lost celestial magic.

name: Caelum
description: A celestial archer seeking to understand his lineage and serve Lunaria.

name: Eldorin
description: A half-elf and half-mermaid bard and tamer. He seeks inspiration for his music by exploring the land and sea.

name: Aria
description: A charismatic human spellcaster.

name: Tank
description: A human warrior with a spear and sword. Played by Mike.

name: Eidolon
description: An elven rogue with no memory of logging in.

name: Elara
description: She is the leader of the Shield Bearers. She is a priestess of light.

name: Gavriel
description: He is a mysterious wizard who is a member of the Shield Bearers.

name: Lyra
description: She is a warrior in the Shield Bearers.

name: Kael
description: A warrior in the Shield Bearers, known for his strength and loyalty.

name: Reyna
description: A Wood Elf ranger and expert marksman with the longbow.

name: Pax
description: A Halfling cleric in Eidolon's group, skilled in healing magic.

name: Thane
description: Leader of a training expedition, a member of the Crimson Vanguard.

name: Selena
description: A human Blade Dancer, part of Thane's group.

name: Ivar
description: Half-Orc Bearkin Barbarian in Thane's group.

name: Vaelor
description: A Dragonborn Paladin, third in command of the Crimson Vanguard.

name: Lirael
description: An Elven Ranger, part of Eidolon's group.

name: Gorrim
description: A Dwarf Berserker, ally to Eidolon's group.

name: Sylas
description: A Human Rogue, allied with Eidolon.

name: Mira
description: A Gnome Artificer, allied with Eidolon's group.

name: Kaelen
description: A Half-Elf Warlock in Eidolon's group.

name: Tharivol
description: A Tiefling Sorcerer, part of Eidolon's group.

name: Eryndor
description: A Human Cleric, ally in Eidolon's group.

name: Briar
description: A Halfling Monk, part of Eidolon's group.

name: Aria's Guild
description: Led by Aria.

name: The Shield Bearers
description: A group known for their defensive tactics and strong leadership.

name: The Elementalists
description: A guild specializing in elemental magic and exploration.

name: The Crimson Vanguard
description: A medium-sized guild aspiring to be the top guild.

name: The Mercenaries
description: A pragmatic group known for efficiency and taking on various tasks.

name: The Forest of Echoes
description: An overarching region encompassing several subregions and mysteries.

name: The Town of Echoes
description: A central hub in the game for players to congregate, trade, and receive quests.

name: The Lake of Whispers
description: A serene lake area known for its mystical ambiance.

name: The Ruins of Eldarion
description: Ancient ruins within the forest, rich in history and artifacts.

name: The Whispering Glade
description: An enchanted or mystical forested area within The Forest of Echoes.

name: The Crossroads of Elements
description: A strategic location within the forest, known as an Elemental Nexus.

name: The Whispering Woods
description: A diverse terrain forest, used for training exercises and exploration.

name: The Forest of Echoes (Subregion)
description: A large forest area sharing its name with the larger region, filled with unique challenges.
